update bet_scence_movie
bet_movie_id = #{betMovieId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bet_scence_id = #{betScenceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
start_day = #{startDay,jdbcType=DATE},
end_day = #{endDay,jdbcType=DATE},
draw_result = #{drawResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
has_jasckpot = #{hasJasckpot,jdbcType=TINYINT},
jasckpot_fee = #{jasckpotFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_jasckpot = #{totalJasckpot,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
has_reservation = #{hasReservation,jdbcType=TINYINT},
reservation_fee = #{reservationFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_reservation = #{totalReservation,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
guess_over_unit = #{guessOverUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
choice_input = #{choiceInput,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sum_box_input = #{sumBoxInput,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bingo_odds = #{bingoOdds,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_reservation_returning = #{totalReservationReturning,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update bet_scence_movie set bet_movie_id = #{betMovieId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bet_scence_id = #{betScenceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, start_day = #{startDay,jdbcType=DATE}, end_day = #{endDay,jdbcType=DATE}, draw_result = #{drawResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, has_jasckpot = #{hasJasckpot,jdbcType=TINYINT}, jasckpot_fee = #{jasckpotFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_jasckpot = #{totalJasckpot,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, has_reservation = #{hasReservation,jdbcType=TINYINT}, reservation_fee = #{reservationFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_reservation = #{totalReservation,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, guess_over_unit = #{guessOverUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_input = #{choiceInput,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sum_box_input = #{sumBoxInput,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bingo_odds = #{bingoOdds,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_reservation_returning = #{totalReservationReturning,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select sb.* from bet_scence_movie sb left join bet_scence b on b.id = sb.bet_scence_id left join bet_movie m on m.id = sb.bet_movie_id where sb.status = 0
mapper.delete: delete * from bet_scence_movie sb where sb.bet_scence_id = #{scenceId} and sb.bet_movie_id = #{movieId}
mapper.select: select * from bet_scence_movie where DATE_FORMAT(start_day,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{yestoday} and status = 0;
mapper.update: update bet_scence_movie set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id from bet_scence_movie where bet_scence_id = #{scenceId} and bet_movie_id = #{movieId} and status = 0 limit 0,1
select id from bet_scence_movie where bet_scence_id = #{scenceId} and bet_movie_id = #{movieId} and status != 0 and DATE_FORMAT(start_day,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{startDay} limit 0,1
